category: news
title: "KDDI partners to advance self-driving truck system"
excerpt: "KDDI partnered with transport company T2 to develop a trunk transportation service business using trucks equipped with autonomous driving technology. The operator stated it will provide T2 with mobile communications systems for remote monitoring of self-driving vehicles and assets through a capital and business alliance."
